title: `–files-from` does not work when `copy/move` with `–drive-shared-with-me` tag.
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
`copy/move` commands do not work with `--files-from` and `--drive-shared-with-me` tag.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
1.49.5
#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
The problem is apparently is on all OS, (Ubuntu, Windows 10 64bit, etc)


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Google Drive.


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
`rclone copy remote1: /home/content --drive-shared-with-me --files-from=upload.txt --stats-one-line -vv`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
# upload.txt
Prison.Break.S05E01.Ogygia.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E02.Kaniel.Outis.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E03.The.Liar.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E04.The.Prisoners.Dilemma.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E05.Contingency.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E06.Phaeacia.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E07.Wine-Dark.Sea.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E08.Progeny.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
```
Logs from `lsf` command:
`rclone lsf remote1: --drive-shared-with-me --files-from upload.txt`
```
$ rclone lsf mnc: --drive-shared-with-me --files-from upload.txt
Prison.Break.S05E01.Ogygia.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E02.Kaniel.Outis.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E03.The.Liar.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E04.The.Prisoners.Dilemma.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E05.Contingency.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E06.Phaeacia.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E07.Wine-Dark.Sea.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E08.Progeny.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
```
```
$ rclone lsf remote1: --drive-shared-with-me --files-from upload.txt

Prison.Break.S05E02.Kaniel.Outis.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E03.The.Liar.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E04.The.Prisoners.Dilemma.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E05.Contingency.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
Prison.Break.S05E06.Phaeacia.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv

Prison.Break.S05E08.Progeny.1080p.BluRay.REMUX.AVC.DTS-HD.MA.5.1-EPSiLON.mkv
```
Logs from `copy` command:
`rclone copy remote1: --drive-shared-with-me --files-from upload.txt /root/content/ --dry-run -vv --stats-one-line`
```

```

I have report this problem in the rclone forum. Link: https://forum.rclone.org/t/files-from-does-not-work-when-copy-in-drive-shared-with-me/12197/4
